verses.verse: When you go forth <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against your enemies, <S%H341><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and a people <S%H5971><s%> more <S%H7227><s%> than you, <S%H3372><s%> you shall not be afraid of them; <S%H3068><s%> for Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> is with you, <S%H5927><s%> who brought you up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
It shall be, <S%H7126><s%> when you draw near to the battle, <S%H4421><s%> that the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall approach <S%H5066><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%>

and shall tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H8085><s%> "Hear, Israel, <S%H3478><s%> you draw near <S%H7131><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against your enemies: <S%H341><s%> don't <S%H3824><s%> let your heart faint; <S%H7401><s%> don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid, nor tremble, <S%H2648><s%> neither be scared <S%H6206><s%> of them; <S%H6440><s%>
for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is he who goes <S%H1980><s%> with you, <S%H3898><s%> to fight for you against your enemies, <S%H341><s%> to save you. <S%H3467><s%>"

The officers <S%H7860><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "What man <S%H376><s%> is there who has built <S%H1129><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and has not dedicated <S%H2596><s%> it? <S%H3212><s%> Let him go and return <S%H7725><s%> to his house, <S%H1004><s%> lest he die <S%H4191><s%> in the battle, <S%H4421><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> dedicate it. <S%H2596><s%>

What man <S%H376><s%> is there who has planted <S%H5193><s%> a vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> and has not used <S%H2490><s%> its fruit? <S%H3212><s%> Let him go and return <S%H7725><s%> to his house, <S%H1004><s%> lest he die <S%H4191><s%> in the battle, <S%H4421><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> use its fruit. <S%H2490><s%>

What man <S%H376><s%> is there who has pledged to be married <S%H781><s%> a wife, <S%H802><s%> and has not taken <S%H3947><s%> her? <S%H3212><s%> Let him go and return <S%H7725><s%> to his house, <S%H1004><s%> lest he die <S%H4191><s%> in the battle, <S%H4421><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> take her. <S%H3947><s%>"

The officers <S%H7860><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> further <S%H3254><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they shall say, <S%H559><s%> "What man <S%H376><s%> is there who is fearful <S%H3373><s%> and fainthearted? <S%H7390><s%> Let him go <S%H3212><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> to his house, <S%H1004><s%> lest his brother <S%H251><s%>'s heart <S%H3824><s%> melt <S%H4549><s%> as his heart. <S%H3824><s%>"

It shall be, <S%H7860><s%> when the officers have made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> that they shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> captains <S%H8269><s%> of armies <S%H6635><s%> at the head <S%H7218><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>
When you draw near <S%H7126><s%> to a city <S%H5892><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against it, <S%H7121><s%> then proclaim peace to it. <S%H7965><s%>

It shall be, <S%H6030><s%> if it makes you answer of peace, <S%H7965><s%> and opens <S%H6605><s%> to you, <S%H5971><s%> then it shall be, that all the people who are found <S%H4672><s%> therein shall become tributary <S%H4522><s%> to you, <S%H5647><s%> and shall serve you.
If it will make no peace <S%H7999><s%> with you, <S%H6213><s%> but will make war <S%H4421><s%> against you, <S%H6696><s%> then you shall besiege it:

and when Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> delivers <S%H5414><s%> it into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> you shall strike <S%H5221><s%> every male <S%H2138><s%> of it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword: <S%H2719><s%>

but the women, <S%H802><s%> and the little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and the livestock, <S%H929><s%> and all that is in the city, <S%H5892><s%> even all its spoil, <S%H7998><s%> you shall take <S%H962><s%> for a prey to yourself; <S%H398><s%> and you shall eat the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of your enemies, <S%H341><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given you. <S%H5414><s%>

Thus you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to all the cities <S%H5892><s%> which are very <S%H3966><s%> far off <S%H7350><s%> from you, <S%H2007><s%> which are not of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of these nations. <S%H1471><s%>

But of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of these peoples, <S%H5971><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> you shall save alive <S%H2421><s%> nothing that breathes; <S%H5397><s%>

but you shall utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroy <S%H2763><s%> them: <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite, and the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite; <S%H2983><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded you; <S%H6680><s%>

that they not teach <S%H3925><s%> you to do <S%H6213><s%> after all their abominations, <S%H8441><s%> which they have done <S%H6213><s%> to their gods; <S%H430><s%> so would you sin <S%H2398><s%> against Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

When you shall besiege <S%H6696><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time, <S%H3117><s%> in making war <S%H3898><s%> against it to take <S%H8610><s%> it, <S%H7843><s%> you shall not destroy its trees <S%H6086><s%> by wielding <S%H5080><s%> an axe <S%H1631><s%> against them; <S%H398><s%> for you may eat of them, <S%H3772><s%> and you shall not cut them down; for is the tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> that it should <S%H935><s%> be besieged of you? <S%H6440><s%>

Only the trees <S%H6086><s%> of which you know <S%H3045><s%> that they are not trees <S%H6086><s%> for food, <S%H3978><s%> you shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> and cut them down; <S%H3772><s%> and you shall build <S%H1129><s%> bulwarks <S%H4692><s%> against the city <S%H5892><s%> that makes <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with you, <S%H3381><s%> until it fall.
